title: Do a 3-point test estimation with data
pageHeader: [Test estimation generation] Do a 3-point test estimation with data

1.revisedPrompt:
Act like a tester. Do a 3-point test estimation with the following data:
Test team size: 1 person
Total number of cases: 38
Time to complete the case for 1 person: 20 minutes
Time for regression and retesting: 20 minutes on average

2.revisedPrompt:
Act as a software tester. Do a 3-point test estimation with the following data:
Test team size: 1 person
Total number of test cases: 38
Time to complete one test case for 1 person: 20 minutes
Time for regression and retesting: 20 minutes on average

3.revisedPrompt:
Act as a software tester. Do a 3-point test estimation with the following data:
Test team size: 1 person
Total number of test cases: 38
Time to complete one test case for 1 person: 20 minutes
Time for regression and retesting: 20 minutes on average
3.changeLog: Switched to using OpenAI GPT-4 for better results.

4.revisedPrompt:
Act as a software tester. Do a 3-point test estimation with the following data:
Test team size: {{TEAM_SIZE}} person
Total number of test cases: {{NUMBER_OF_TEST_CASES}}
Time to complete one test case for 1 person: {{TIME_PER_TEST_CASE}} minutes
Time for regression and retesting: {{REGRESSION_RETESTING_TIME}} minutes on average

5.revisedPrompt:
Act as a lead software development engineer in test. Do a 3-point test estimation with the following data:
Test team size: {{TEAM_SIZE}} person.
Total number of test cases: {{NUMBER_OF_TEST_CASES}}.
Time to complete one test case for 1 person: {{TIME_PER_TEST_CASE}} minutes.
Time for regression and retesting: {{REGRESSION_RETESTING_TIME}} minutes on average.
